000: On the way we passed this abandoned villa. We decided to take a quick look.
001: The outside of the villa has some nice details.
002: The back side of the villa looks a bit messy.
003: The inside of the house has been vandalized and repainted.
004: The residents left without taking their belongings with them. Unfortunately everything is trashed.
005: Setz dich means have a seat.
006: The attic, the roof is more or less gone.
007: The floor has a nice mosaic tile pattern.
008: Finally a picture of the corridor downstairs. Once it must have been a beautiful house
